00001 import froggersrc
00002 from gui import feedbackpanel
00003 import os
00004 
00005 class GamePanel(feedbackpanel.FeedbackPanel):
00006     def __init__(self, parent, id):
00007         feedbackpanel.FeedbackPanel.__init__(self, parent, id, size = (350, 200))
00008 
00009         import sys
00010         ##Note we call the GetHandle() method of a control in the window/frame, not the wxFrame itself
00011         self.hwnd = self.GetChildren()[0].GetHandle()
00012         if sys.platform == "win32":
00013             os.environ['SDL_VIDEODRIVER'] = 'windib'
00014         os.environ['SDL_WINDOWID'] = str(self.hwnd) #must be before init
00015 
00016         ## NOTE WE DON'T IMPORT PYGAME UNTIL NOW.  Don't put "import pygame" at the top of the file.
00017         import pygame
00018         pygame.display.init()
00019         from pygame.locals import *
00020         #froggersrc()
00021 
00022         path = os.getcwd()
00023         pygame.init()
00024 
00025         size = width, height = 640, 480
00026         screen = pygame.display.set_mode(size)
00027 
00028         # Load background
00029         board = pygame.image.load(path+'/app/frogger/background.png').convert()
00030 
00031         # Load frog
00032         frog = pygame.image.load(path+'/app/frogger/frog.tga').convert()
00033         base_rect = frog.get_rect()
00034         frog_rect = base_rect.move(0,0)
00035 
00036         running = True
00037         while running:
00038             # Event handling
00039             for event in pygame.event.get():
00040                 if event.type == QUIT:
00041                     running = False
00042                 elif event.type == KEYDOWN:
00043                     if event.key == K_ESCAPE:
00044                         running = False
00045 
00046                     if event.key == K_UP:
00047                         frog_rect = frog_rect.move(0, -40)
00048                     elif event.key == K_DOWN:
00049                         frog_rect = frog_rect.move(0, 40)
00050                     elif event.key == K_LEFT:
00051                         frog_rect = frog_rect.move(-40, 0)
00052                     elif event.key == K_RIGHT:
00053                         frog_rect = frog_rect.move(40, 0)
00054                         
00055 
00056             screen.blit(board, board.get_rect())
00057             screen.blit(frog, frog_rect)
00058             pygame.display.flip()
00059 
00060 
00061         pygame.quit()
00062
